tool_description: Classifies companies into specific industry categories and subcategories to enable targeted sales strategies and messaging customization.

company_name.description: Name of the company to classify

classification_system.description: Classification system to use: NAICS, SIC, GICS

error_messages: Company not found: Unable to find the specified company for classification

industry_description.description: Detailed description of the industry category
